DOC.brief_summary: Different case reports are showing that depending on the drug used for eye drops, it might provoke a painful sensation. Actually two leading NSAIDs are used in ophthalmology. This study is intended to provide information about this parameter concerning these two drugs.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Pain Sensation During Single Use of Two Topical Non-Steroidal Anti-Inflammatory Drugs (NSAIDs)
DOC.criteria: Patient over 21 years old No ocular surface pathology Eligible for cataract surgery Any other eye pathology other than cataract
